title: notice: undefined index: id while rescanning after adding custom mount
body:
just added a custom mount as admin user, then logged in with my "normal" user for which the mounts should be visible. i get tons of messages like this (in the browser window):

```
notice: undefined index: id in /www/owncloud/lib/filecache.php on line 371
call stack: 0.0001 639448
1. {main}() /www/owncloud/index.php:0 0.0103 916288
2. oc::handlerequest() /www/owncloud/index.php:28 0.0497 1172640
3. oc::loadappscriptfile() /www/owncloud/lib/base.php:458 0.0499 1173464
4. require_once('/www/owncloud/apps/files/index.php') /www/owncloud/lib/base.php:473 0.0707 1388224
5. oc_files::getdirectorycontent() /www/owncloud/apps/files/index.php:47 0.0708 1388888
6. oc_filecache::getfoldercontent() /www/owncloud/lib/files.php:90 0.0763 1442848
7. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache.php:261 0.2541 2685176
8. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2581 2686056
9. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2787 2687992
10. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2834 2689968
11. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2936 2692056
12. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2991 2695248
13. oc_hook::emit() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:91 0.8205 6589840
14. call_user_func() /www/owncloud/lib/hook.php:62 0.8205 6589896
15. oc_filecache_update::filesystemwatcherwrite() /www/owncloud/lib/hook.php:0 0.8205 6589896
16. oc_filecache_update::update() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:117 0.8750 6611472
17. oc_filecache::increasesize() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:178

notice: undefined index: mimetype in /www/owncloud/lib/filecache.php on line 373
call stack: 0.0001 639448
1. {main}() /www/owncloud/index.php:0 0.0103 916288
2. oc::handlerequest() /www/owncloud/index.php:28 0.0497 1172640
3. oc::loadappscriptfile() /www/owncloud/lib/base.php:458 0.0499 1173464
4. require_once('/www/owncloud/apps/files/index.php') /www/owncloud/lib/base.php:473 0.0707 1388224
5. oc_files::getdirectorycontent() /www/owncloud/apps/files/index.php:47 0.0708 1388888
6. oc_filecache::getfoldercontent() /www/owncloud/lib/files.php:90 0.0763 1442848
7. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache.php:261 0.2541 2685176
8. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2581 2686056
9. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2787 2687992
10. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2834 2689968
11. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2936 2692056
12. oc_filecache_update::updatefolder() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:89 0.2991 2695248
13. oc_hook::emit() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:91 0.8205 6589840
14. call_user_func() /www/owncloud/lib/hook.php:62 0.8205 6589896
15. oc_filecache_update::filesystemwatcherwrite() /www/owncloud/lib/hook.php:0 0.8205 6589896
16. oc_filecache_update::update() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:117 0.8750 6611472
17. oc_filecache::increasesize() /www/owncloud/lib/filecache/update.php:178
```

and once more, the loading of the page takes forever without any progress indication (see https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/96).
